page.title: 13HOME LIFE
page.content: At 08.00 I get up, go into the kitchen and have breakfast. I get dressed and wash,pack my bag and go to call for my friend. We walk to school. At 08.55 we go in for the register and have assembly_ usually a story, hymms and prayers. We spend the day working at maths, written work, art, games, music etc. We have one playtime in the morning when we can buy crisps and one in the afternoon. I take sandwiches to eat at lunchtime and then play on the field. We finish school at 15.40. When I get home I have a snack, watch TV and make part of a plastic model. At 18.30 I have my tea, get changed into my uniform and go to Sea Scouts. We play games like tunnel tick and do some badgework until 21.00. Most of us stay until 21.30 and play pool table tennis and badminton. When I get home I watch TV and go to bed at 22.30.
